original_title: From No.4 Pingyuanli to No.4 Tianqiaobeili
overview: Ma Quisha talks directly to the camera about her relationship with her mother, her background, her tortuous journey to maturity and of freeing herself from the overbearing parental pressure of having to succeed at any cost. She does so with great difficulty.
title: From No.4 Pingyuanli to No.4 Tianqiaobeili
